function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Impact of COVID-19 on global economy","Impact":"Intense and long-lasting economic impacts","Mitigation":"Coordinated, decisive, inclusive, and innovative policy action, financial and technical support to vulnerable nations","Technologies":"Not applicable","People":"Less industrialized nations","Owner":"Leading economies"},{"Description":"Famine due to COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Potential famine of biblical proportions","Mitigation":"Raising funds to fight COVID-19, international solidarity, financial and technical support to vulnerable populations","Technologies":"Fundraising technology, international aid technology","People":"Vulnerable and poor populations","Owner":"UN, international organizations"},{"Description":"Effect of pandemics on vulnerable populations","Impact":"Strong effects on the weakest, such as people in lockdown without paid leave, women, low-wage employees, and part-time workers","Mitigation":"Pandemic management improvements, support for vulnerable populations","Technologies":"Pandemic management technology, economic support technology","People":"People in lockdown, women, low-wage employees, part-time workers","Owner":"Policy makers, organizations"}]}
